sizes_available: one-size, for a pre-school toddler of 1 - 2 years
full_text: My Babbity Baby Jacket is very popular ! From month to month, it is always in the ‘Top 5’ of favourited designs. This version is new - and can be knitted with or without a hood . This lovely jacket was knitted by Joanne Loasby - a member of my facebook group A lovely cosy gender-neutral jacket :) Requires: 2 strands of DK knitted together (around 330 – 350g) (or one strand of UK chunky weight yarn) 6mm needles 3 buttons So sweet ! To get this free pattern please click on the https link just below ↓
name: Ravelry: Babbity Chunky Hooded Jacket pattern by marianna mel
